Class netscape.application.FileChooser 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.FileChooser
public class FileChooser
extends Object
Object subclass allowing the user to select a file. FileChooser creates a a modal window, blocking the calling thread and remaining onscreen until the user dismisses it.

LOAD_TYPE
Type used to create a FileChooser that loads files.
SAVE_TYPE
Type used to create a FileChooser that saves files.

FileChooser(RootView, String, int)
Constructs a FileChooser associated with the RootView rootView, with title title and type type.

directory()
Returns the FileChooser's current directory.
file()
Returns the FileChooser's current file.
filenameFilter()
Returns the filename filter.
setDirectory(String)
Sets the FileChooser to the specified directory.
setFile(String)
Sets the FileChooser to the specified file.
setFilenameFilter(FilenameFilter)
Sets the filename filter.
setTitle(String)
Sets the FileChooser's Window's title.
showModally()
Brings the FileChooser onscreen.
title()
Returns the FileChooser's Window's title.
type()
Returns the FileChooser's type, either LOAD_TYPE or SAVE_TYPE.

LOAD_TYPE 
 public static final int LOAD_TYPE
Type used to create a FileChooser that loads files.

SAVE_TYPE 
 public static final int SAVE_TYPE
Type used to create a FileChooser that saves files.

                    String title,
                    int type)
Constructs a FileChooser associated with the RootView rootView, with title title and type type.
